title: Welcome to Next.js
content: Next.js is a React framework for building production-ready applications.

title: File-Based Routing
content: Next.js automatically maps files in the app directory to routes.

title: Data Fetching Methods
content: Next.js supports SSR, SSG, and ISR for fetching data efficiently.

title: Image Optimization
content: Use the Image component to deliver optimized images with lazy loading.
